name: Alien (hunterkennedy)
description:
Alien is a small top down rhythm game about the most important and fulfilling component of anyone's life, office work! Become a part of something so much bigger and wealthier and less deserving than the individual!

Time your actions with the tick of the clock for maximum score! 

Tip: Move your character to select Play! 

Leave your high score and cause of death in the comments!

CONTROLS: WASD to move, F to interact

Sound Attributions:

Alarm Clock Sound: https://freesound.org/people/kwahmah_02/sounds/250629/

Ticks: https://freesound.org/people/daveincamas/sounds/27077/

Small Crowd: https://freesound.org/people/JohnsonBrandEditing/sounds/243373/

Keyboard: https://freesound.org/people/imagery2/sounds/456906/

Office Phone Ring: https://freesound.org/people/visualasylum/sounds/329781/

Subway: https://freesound.org/people/miklovan/sounds/198378/

Munch: https://freesound.org/people/Yudena/sounds/377572/

Chime Up: https://freesound.org/people/mpaol2023/sounds/370182/
